is_restaurant_open.required: Is Restaurant Open flag is required
is_restaurant_open.valid: Is Restaurant Open flag should have a valid value

is_active.valid: Is Active flag should have a valid value

open_time_1.valid: Restaurant Open Time should be in 24 hours format

close_time_1.valid: Restaurant Close Time should be in 24 hours format
close_time_1.less_then_start_time: Close time must not be less then Start time

open_time_2.less_then_start_time: Open time 2 must not be less then Close time

close_time_2.less_then_start_time: Close time 2 must not be less then Open time 2

min_reservation_time.number: Minimum Reservation Time should be in number format

phone_number.number: Phone number should be in number format
